item.title: `Compton_MLEM`, A GPU-Based Image Reconstruction Application in CUDA
item.description: In this post I want to try to reconstruct an image from the simulated data in the previous post. Supposedly the original source consists of two point sources close together around z= -0.5 cm. However, I found it hard to understand the properties of the reconstruction. I will need to redo this simulation with full a priori information about the simulated source. So, I have looked into the reconstruction application Compton_MLEM by Matt Leigh, Ref.
